price: Na kaumu ngapi tuliziangamiza kabla yao walio kuwa na nguvu zaidi kuliko hawa! Nao walitanga tanga katika nchi nyingi. Je! Walipata pa kukimbilia?
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
footnotes: Na wengi tumekwisha wateketeza kabla ya hawa wanao kadhibisha katika mataifa yaliyo kwisha pita. Wao walikuwa na nguvu na madaraka zaidi kuliko hawa. Wakaizunguka miji wakishughulika kuchungua na kutafuta. Je! Walipata pa kukimbilia wasiangamizwe?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum baṭshan fanaqqabū fī al-bilādi hal min maḥīṣin
